title: [UPDATE] Firewall Issue 19/01/2015
body:
Summoners,

We are aware there has been an increase in players unable to join some of their games due to the "firewall" error after champion select, that has been appearing within the last week.
We have been collecting data and analyzing what could be causing this issue with our engineers and have decided to implement a small change that might alleviate some of the pain players have been experiencing.

For those players still experiencing the issue, please head over to http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/tools/network-logs and run the diagnostic tool and submit the form so we can use this data on our journey.

Keep this thread in your line of sight for further updates as they become available.

-ToxicHawk

replies.body:
This error has been around since I started playing 3+ years ago. Why has it not been eradicated yet?

~Riot Problems

Hey Guys,
Thanks to everyone offering their ideas and help, it really does show how awesome you guys are. We will be looking into the personal routers and windows updates as an option so thanks for bringing those up.

I did not want to have to resort to such a thing but, Notice me senpai!!!.

Also on a serious note I had this issue a while back, Something to try guys is check the UDP ports on your windows firewall / virus software / router. Often during updates companies will close known ports that are abused. I have not had a problem since.

Once again pls notice me senpai.

Update: The best way to test the most likely cause is to disable your Antivirus's firewall / Windows firewall and try again. Most people never update their routers firmware
Here is the photo, i cant even get onto the lol patcher, no firewalls were running, so ave no idea why it isnt working still

Hey Riot, I am in a big problem that I have been dealing with. For the last couple of days, I have tried updating to the latest patch of LoL, but have never got passed 85%. As soon as it hits around the 80% mark the downloading speed drops significantly. Please help! 
I have already tried deleting RADS and launcher and restarting.
I have uninstalled and re-installed multiple times already. 
PLEASE HELP!
I have finally submitted to the tyrannous rule of the Telstra Regime, therefore i have no problems with the client. {{summoner:10}}

Dear All,

I am getting the Firewall Error after Champ select, I am ALSO getting in-game LAG-SPIKES (during team fights and high apm micro) the lag-spikes' peak and trough @ around 19ms to 444ms ~

I am with TPG.
I've noticed this problem for 48 hours from this post.

below are my tracert result:

I'm having this problem but not after champ select, but when i open the launcher. It keeps saying rads error and it cannot connect to the http server. This is preventing me to play this game and its getting quite annoying. Last time i had this problem i tried to reinstall league. Problem was that when i got the launcher again i still couldnt open it which prevented me from even patching it.

This sounds like a slightly different error. You aren't with TPG by chance?
We have found a quick work around for people with RADS errors by changing your DNS to use Google DNS (8.8.8.8). Try that and let us know how it goes.

Thanks for the help Toxic but it isnt working. I tried to do what you said but it still doesnt work. Do you have any other solutions?

EDIT: I have fixed it now

Yo Riot dunno if this will help you or not, but I have been experiencing this firewall issue for over 7 months, and when I sent a support ticket for help, you guys replied with a bunch of steps. Unfortunately, none worked and I accidentally corrupted my router, but now my game works again with the new router. Therefore the firewall problem might simply be a problem with people's router.
